attributes.additional_details: We need to stand up for Britain and defend European values.
attributes.background: We want to stop importing American goods and add a tariff on to exported goods to America.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

It's not for the Government to boycott goods. Additionally, tariffs are applied on imports coming into a country, not exports that are going out of the country. 

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/716617
